description.value:
Frequency once per day

You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing [[/r 5d8[piercing]]] damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes [[/r 5[bleed]]] damage. At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

[[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d8 #piercing]]{Levelled} piercing damage

[[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2))[bleed]]]{Levelled} damage

Note The feat does not specify the type of saving throw required. A reflex saving throw had been added, in line with Barbed Quills.

value.value: quillcoat shisk or quill unarmed attack
